Hero.hero_title: Open-Source project management in your Telegram chat
Hero.hero_subtitle: Implement a user-friendly tool for scheduling and task management

Integration.integration_with_telegram: Integration with Telegram groups and supergroups
Integration.easy_integration: Easy integration with Telegram groups and supergroups
Integration.manage_notifications: Manage goals and notifications when task statuses change

Create.create_task: Create tasks in a way that suits you
Create.ability_create: The ability to create tasks both through the interface of the mini-application and directly in chat with the bot
Create.convenient_input: Convenient input format that allows you to quickly set the name, description and deadline of the task.

Open-source.open_source_text: PlanJet is an open source project.

Self-hosted.data_control_title: High privacy of your data. Manage and store your data on your own servers
Self-hosted.customizability_title: Ability to modify code and functionality to meet your specific requirements
Self-hosted.independence_title: There is no risk of service disconnection.

Manage.manage_task_with_planjet_title: Contact us to quickly implement the tool in your team
